description.value:
You are a trained agent of the Starfinder Society. You become an expert in Society. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Additional Lore] feat for Starfinder Lore; if you were already trained in Starfinder Lore, you also become trained in a Lore skill of your choice.

Special You can take this feat if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Xenoarchaeologist Dedication]{Xenoarchaeologist Archetype Dedication} feat even if you haven't taken two additional xenoarchaeologist feats. Xenoarchaeologist archetype feats count as Starfinder field agent feats, and vice-versa, for purposes of completing the archetypes.
